## Basic convergence analysis

```{r}
files <- list.files(pattern = "*_trail_layer1.png", path = 'plots')
for(fil in files){
  print(fil)
  print(knitr::include_graphics(paste('plots/',fil,sep='')))
}
```


## Marginal distributions of summaries

The marginal distributions of collected statistics are

```{r}
files <- list.files(pattern = "*_distrub.png", path = 'plots')
for(fil in files){
  print(fil)
  print(knitr::include_graphics(paste('plots/',fil,sep='')))
}
```

## Extended convergence analysis

### Per temperature

```{r}
files <- list.files(pattern = "*.png", path = 'plots')
for(fil in files){
  if(grepl('trail_layer', fil, fixed=T)){
    print(fil)
    print(knitr::include_graphics(paste('plots/',fil,sep='')))
  }
}
```

### Per chain

```{r}
files <- list.files(pattern = "*.png", path = 'plots')
for(fil in files){
  if(grepl('trail_chain', fil, fixed=T)){
    print(fil)
    print(knitr::include_graphics(paste('plots/',fil,sep='')))
  }
}
```
